review: I'm sure it's a good product.  I got a message it won't work with my router.  It's a new router but I'm not much on Internet so I probably just don't know how to fix.
author: jeff heath

review: Great product my son loves it!
author: amstudentofjc

review: This is actually the second product I bought which I gave to my son (who has his own apartment) since I love it so much to watch Netflix at home using my laptop. For $35, it's really a value for money. It's probably the best small gadget for watching movies and I really recommend it.
author: Abapster

review: I was able to set it up without issue but cannot get the audio to play.
author: PSpen

review: We have 5 TVs and now have 5 Chromecasts. They work well. I can even project a recipe from my laptop to the TV in the kitchen when I want to view a recipe.
author: D. Hitt

review: My recipient LOVES it and can't stop raving about it.  He says it's convenient and easy to use.
author: Amazon Customer "VCOM gal"

review: Bought a second one for my other TV.
author: Casey
